name: ESTATE OF Joseph SPIRKO, Sr., Deceased. Appeal of Stella OKRASINSKI and Ronald Okrasinski

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Joseph SPIRKO, Sr., Deceased. Appeal of Stella OKRASINSKI and Ronald Okrasinski.

opinions.text:
DECREE
PER CURIAM.
Decree vacated and case remanded for new hearing on merits. Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: R. James Kamage, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Thomas Rozycki, Wilkes-Barre, Michael J. Hudacek, Plymouth, Conrad Falvello, Sugarloaf, Paula Garrety, Harrisburg, for Jos. Spirko, Jr.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 105
ESTATE OF Joseph SPIRKO, Sr., Deceased. Appeal of Stella OKRASINSKI and Ronald Okrasinski.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 20, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
R. James Kamage, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Thomas Rozycki, Wilkes-Barre, Michael J. Hudacek, Plymouth, Conrad Falvello, Sugarloaf, Paula Garrety, Harrisburg, for Jos. Spirko, Jr.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
